product_name: REI Fleet Skapris - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: Fun and sporty, REI Fleet Skapris (skirt with capris) in plus sizes combine the coverage of a skirt with the sleek performance of a pair of workout capris. The built-in capris wick moisture away to keep you comfortable; they also have mesh panels behind the knees to increase ventilation. A mesh panel along the back yoke further boosts ventilation. Fabric provides UPF 50+ protection from harmful UV rays. Elastic waistband with drawcord provides a comfortable fit. Zippered lumbar pocket is handy for stashing valuables; waterproof liner helps keep the contents dry. Skirt features a 14.5 in. outseam. REI Fleet Skapris in plus sizes feature an active fit that provides a full range of motion.
short_description: Fun and sporty, REI Fleet Skapris (skirt with capris) in plus sizes combine the coverage of a skirt with the sleek performance of a pair of workout capris.
